posts.post_title: FS - 8 SGC graded T205 Yankees-prices reduced - make an offer
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell the following 8 T205 Yankees.  Now priced individually or take the lot of 8 for $230 obo.  Payment via paypal (money owed/family & friends) at [url]mcantista@juno.com[/url].  Price includes delivery via USPS in continental US. Email or PM with interest or questions. Thanks, Mike

Thanks guys.  Hard to believe the Yanks don't know when they really came to be and did not take advantage of celebrating a 100 year anniversary...

Mike,

I'll take the Ford with white hat.  PM sent.
